description: This file defines a React component for adding a new transaction, including a dialog form with validation, state management, and external service integration.

methods.name: AddTransactionDialog
methods.description: React functional component that renders a dialog for creating a new transaction, managing form state, validation, and submission.

methods.name: onSubmit
methods.description: Function invoked on form submission to send transaction data to the server, handle success or error, and update UI state.
